articles.title: Summary of Baltic Sea (BO)
articles.description: Summary report generated from a single Parquet file has been created from over 750 NetCDF files from Baltic Sea NRT in situ observations.
articles.contents:
Contents
1. Basic Information
2. Descriptive Statistics of BO CTD Data
3. Locations
4. Distribution of profiles over time
5. Duplicate profiles within platforms
6. Duplicate profiles across platforms
7. Observation counts by profile




















1. Basic Information
NetCDF files
Dataset ID: cmems_obs-ins_bal_phybgcwav_mynrt_na_irr
Duration: history
Region: Baltic Sea (BO)
Category: CT (CTD)
Parquet file
BO data: netcdf_nrt_bo.parquet
2. Descriptive Statistics of BO CTD Data



Number of observations: 9,334,806
Number of platform: 753
Number of profiles: 112,962
Summary statistics by profiles



3. Locations
Longitude: 6.3 to 27.453
Latitude: 54 to 65.73
Locations by profiles



Mapped locations of all profiles and three selected platforms



Histograms of longitudes and latitudes from all profiles



4. Distribution of profiles over time
Number of profiles



Year



Month



Mapped locations of four time spans
ts7889: 1978 ~ 1989
ts9006: 1990 ~ 2006
ts07A2: 2007 ~ 2012
tsA3B5: 2013 ~ 2025



5. Duplicate profiles within platforms
Detection criteria
To identify potential duplicate profiles, the following variables must match:
Platform (platform_code)
Timestamp (profile_timestamp)
Rounded precise longitude (round(precise_longitude, 3))
Rounded precise latitude (round(precise_latitude, 3))
Duplicate profiles



6. Duplicate profiles across platforms
Detection criteria
To identify potential duplicate profiles, the following variables must match:
Timestamp (profile_timestamp)
Rounded precise longitude (round(precise_longitude, 3))
Rounded precise latitude (round(precise_latitude, 3))
Duplicate profiles



7. Observation counts by profile
Histograms of observation counts per profile



Mapped locations of 1, 2, 3000-3600, and â‰¥4000 observations
